title: Super Nintendo Classic Edition
text: Super Nintendo Classic Edition $119.95 Relive the golden age of gaming with the Nintendo SNES Classic Edition: a compact console featuring 21 preloaded classics, 1080p HDMI output, and two nostalgic controllers, perfect for plug-and-play fun on modern TVs. Preloaded Games: Comes with 21 classic SNES titles, including Super Mario World and The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past. • HDMI Output: Supports 1080p resolution for modern TVs. • Two Controllers: Includes two wired controllers styled after the original SNES controllers. • Compact Design: Small, lightweight, and easy to set up. • Save Game Feature: Allows suspend points to pause and resume gameplay at any time. • Plug-and-Play: No cartridges needed—simply connect and play. • Regional Compatibility: NTSC version, designed for the US and Canadian markets. Complete game list: Contra III: The Alien Wars Donkey Kong Country EarthBound Final Fantasy III (VI in Japan) F-Zero Kirby Super Star Kirby's Dream Course The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past Mega Man X Secret of Mana Star Fox Star Fox 2 (first official release on this console) Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting Super Castlevania IV Super Ghouls 'n Ghosts Super Mario Kart Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars Super Mario World Super Metroid Super Punch-Out!! Yoshi's Island Includes: Includes: Console, 2* Controllers, AC Adapter, HDMI, USB Cable. Shop our website for an even larger selection of items!
